entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 1.
